Class MasterClientBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.ClientBase
      • tachyon.MasterClientBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockMasterClient, BlockMasterClient, FileSystemMasterClient, FileSystemMasterClient, KeyValueMasterClient, LineageMasterClient

    public abstract class MasterClientBase
extends ClientBase
    The base class for master clients.

      • getAddress

        protected InetSocketAddress getAddress()
